name: Extreme Speed
description: You rush to attack with incredible speed. As a bonus action, you can immediately move up to 10ft and make a melee attack against a creature in range without taking an attack of opportunity, doing 1d6 normal damage on a hit.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d12 at level 5, 2d8 at level 10, and 4d6 at level 17.
